scripts.test: set NODE_ENV=development && set DEBUG=*:info,*:error && set APP_DIR=examples/app && set PUBLIC_DIR=examples/app/public && set PORT=3000 && node test/index.js
scripts.dev: set NODE_ENV=development && set DEBUG=*:info,*:error && set APP_DIR=examples/app && set PUBLIC_DIR=examples/app/public && set PORT=3000 && node index.js
scripts.prod: set NODE_ENV=production && set APP_DIR=app && set REDIS_URL=redis://localhost:27017&& set MONGODB_URL=mongodb://localhost:27017/database && set SESSION_KEY=someRandomSessionKey && set DEBUG=*:info,*:error && set PUBLIC_DIR=app/public && set PORT=3000 && node index.js
